about_the_game:
Hi there!
This is the Official Soundtrack of MEANDERS!
All 21 tracks composed and produced by Chadsky.

Track List:
01 - Vietnam
02 - Relaxo
03 - Disco Pablo
04 - Atmosferix
05 - Robot Toast
06 - Edge
07 - Methods
08 - Druma
09 - Dragon
10 - Digging
11 - Clouds
12 - Ringdove
13 - Academy
14 - Sam
15 - Elephants
16 - Funko
17 - Vic
18 - Pencil & Paper
19 - S P A C E
20 - Whistle
21 - Namaste (Bonus Track)

Total Time: [37:43]

Files available both as MP3 and WAVs!

short_description: The official soundtrack of MEANDERS, enjoy and relax!
